review_data.title: Veggie means falafel
review_data.content: As a vegan, you get falafel bowl, falafel wrap, falafel sandwiches. Or nothing. Food looks nice, but all the food I have so far was shockingly bland.

review_data.title: Colorful and healthy food
review_data.content: Oh from where do I start?...everything is just so good! They have great smoothies, sandwiches, salads, wraps... I'm vegan and love their falafel wrap and sandwich.

review_data.title: Healthy & Tasty grab and go
review_data.content: I went to Switzerland with my sister almost a year ago and Hitzberger was one of our favorite choice for quick but healthy & tasty meal! I love green beans salad, the dressing was fresh and delish as it mixed with many kinds of herb....More

review_data.title: great breakfast-to-go
review_data.content: the selection of juices and smoothies is perfect for a nice breakfast, i pass by here pretty much every morning on my way to work. sometimes the line looks terribly long with people queueing even outside, but the staff is very effective and also friendly....More

review_data.title: Fast food "Vegi"
review_data.content: Ho mangiato un Vegi-Wrap, era molto buono. Ci sono delle sedie e delle tavole per sedersi. I prezzi sono corretti.

review_data.title: Healthy and good!
review_data.content: I love their Ice Tea. Its with stevia and finally not full of sugars as so many others. Great salads and wraps. Heathly and very tastefully

review_data.title: Healthy fast food, vegan food available
review_data.content: There is a Hitzberger restaurant/shop within the main station in Zurich (below the ground floor). It offers a wide variety of healthy fast food, and vegan options are available.

review_data.title: frisch
review_data.content: Bei Hitzberger sind die Produkte frisch, vielfältig und gesund, die Fruchtsäfte herrlich. Verkaufspersonal freundlich. Preise weil Bio im oberen Segment.

review_data.title: Great takeaway
review_data.content: Perfect place for grabbing a takeaway. Reasonably priced and good variety of food. Usually visit this place for lunch, and the service is quite good with low waiting times. The staff is helpful and friendly.
